comment:
* Data for an action supported from a safety source status {@link SafetySourceStatus} in the * Safety Center page. * *

The purpose of the action is to add a surface to allow the user to perform an action * relating to the safety source status. * *

The action will be shown as a clickable icon chosen from a predefined set of icons (see * {@link IconType}). The icon should indicate to the user what action will be performed on * clicking on it.

methods.name: public int getIconType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the type of icon to be displayed in the UI. * *

The icon type should indicate what action will be performed if when invoked.

methods.name: public PendingIntent getPendingIntent()
methods.comment:
* Returns a {@link PendingIntent} that will start an activity when the icon action is
         * clicked on.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
